text: Mělník () is a town in the Central Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. It is the capital of the Mělník District. About 20,000 people lived there. It is at the confluence of the Elbe and Vltava rivers, about north of Prague. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Melnik2000.cz * Culture in Melnik Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:Central Bohemian Region
title: Mělník
